The product of using a Hive Chunk on a Tharafly, these can be used on a Hive Spawner to summon the $(l:aoa3:barathos_bosses#hive_king)Hive King$(/l)

These can be used to convert all kinds of minerals and ingots into coins, including those from other dimensions. If you find one, make sure to bring it back to your base!
